title: 3 x 1000th Win

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Hello, we have tried posting this on the Leagueoflegends Reddit. But it was deleted, so we thought we would try here. 

My friends and i have **999** wins
as you can see in the screen shot above, We were hoping that a Riot Caster could play our **1000th** win. We have been playing league for more then two years trying to get to this point. This would mean the world to us

replies.body: I'm not a caster, but I'd be happy to play with you! :3
More than two years and you just now hit that mark? ... kinda slow if you ask me.
I have been playing at least 5 years and I only have 419 wins. Believe it or not, some people actually have lives.

> I have been playing at least 5 years and I only have 419 wins. Believe it or not, some people actually have lives.

It has absolutely nothing to do with having a life. Whatever a 'life' is anyhow.
?? where do i buy a live? help pls
Considering the posted is a plat v, they mustn't have much of a "life" :P

> Considering the posted is a plat v, they mustn't have much of a "life" :P

I'm Plat 2 right now, and have been around since the first month of release... Still not 1,000 wins in normal. What does rank have to do with anything?
It shows that you play a lot still, so there's no "life" here to be had.
maybe he plays ranked, so stop being a dink
Bumps don't do anything in the new format.
bumping does not work outside of GD
